# Aufgabe

In welchem Datensatz gibt es mehr Variation?


```{r echo=FALSE}
set.seed(42)
d <- tibble(
  x1 = rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = .1),
  x2 = rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = 1),
  x3 = rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = 10),
  x4 = rnorm(10, mean = 0, sd = 100),
)
```


Datensatz A:

```{r}
d %>% 
  select(x1) %>% 
  display()
```



Datensatz B:

```{r}
d %>% 
  select(x2) %>% 
  display()
```




Datensatz C:

```{r}
d %>% 
  select(x3) %>% 
  display()
```






Datensatz D:

```{r}
d %>% 
  select(x4) %>% 
  display()
```



Answerlist
----------
* A
* B
* C
* D
